title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When trying to set the color or background color to orange for a report item, the color does not change as expected.
EB: The color or background color for a report item should change to orange when selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Observe that the color of the report item does not change to orange as expected.
